name: Digital Sunrise
description:
Imagine yourself in an offworld mining station circling a distant asteroid. You find yourself in the bar after a hard days work mining lithium. Hunkered down in a corner, thoughts of loved ones play on your mind. A few other workers sit around sipping their drinks whilst screens behind the bar play this digital sunrise.  

VHS mixed with the original animation captures the feel of 80s/90s sci-fi films.
